title: Engineering Work Experience Internship
description:
This internship module is open to full-time undergraduate students who have completed at
least 40MCs and plan to proceed on an approved internship of at least 10 weeks. This module
recognizes work experiences in fields that could lead to viable career pathways but the emphasis will
be on start-ups and entrepreneurship related internships. In general, this module is accessible to
students for academic credit even if they had previously completed internship stints for academic
credit not exceeding 10MC, and if the new workscope is substantially differentiated from previously
completed ones.
prerequisite: This internship module is open to full-time undergraduate students who have completed at least 40MCs and plan to proceed on an approved internship of at least 10 weeks in duration in the vacation period.
preclusion: Full-time undergraduate students who have accumulated more than 10MCs for previous internship stints.
